title: Tobacco Cards for Sale - Holiday Discount
author: chris

posts.post_title: Tobacco Cards for Sale - Holiday Discount
posts.post_content:
I am offering a 15% off (Holiday discount) on anything in my Ebay store for Net54 users. The offer is valid for all "buy it now" items in my Ebay store. Please send all requests to [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url], please do not purchase the cards through Ebay as it will charge me more in fees. I will ship for FREE. I accept Paypal, Money Orders and Personal Checks. 

Here is a link to my store.
[url]http://shop.ebay.com/somersetvelvet/m.html[/url]

Happy Holidays

Chris :)

I'll take the PSA 3 T206 Ganzel.  Email sent.

Mark
i'll take the ritchey orange belt...pls email me invoice at [url]peterullman@hotmail.com[/url]

I want the AB Davidson as well.  Email sent.

Mark
Hello Chris and thank-you for the kind offer -- I just emailed you regarding your T206 Walsh.
I'll take the Larry Doyle, throwing card.

Thank you for all the interest. Emails sent and cards are in the mail. The 15% off discount is valid through Christmas Day.

Happy Holidays
